data.name: RPGScenery - Bandit Hideout Scene
data.detailed_description:
This scene was inspired by a personal experience I had while hiking, when we came across a huge fissure next to a route. We climbed down and saw a similar sight to what you can see in this scene (except the buildings and the equipment of course). It immediately occured to me what a good little hiding place could be created here.

This DLC contains 3 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
